We have highlighted a number of example regions, showing the versatility of epilogos.
These are regions with high levels of surprisal, or relative entropy.
That is, the observed local pattern of chromatin states across epigenomes is highly unlikely to be observed by chance.

   


These data are provided as-is, and a manuscript is in preparation.
Please contact Wouter Meuleman (last name @ mit dot edu) for comments and suggestions. Thanks!
